title: Muthoot FinCorp to rely less on flagship gold loans
description: Muthoot FinCorp aims to diversify from gold loans to 80% in 3 years, becoming a full-stack financial services provider. Plans include expanding branches, hiring, and offering new services to lower-middle income groups.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
